name: com.meta.movement
description: Contains sample scenes, prefabs, scripts, and art assets for Movement SDK.

samples.description: Samples that demonstrate the face tracking capabilities of the Movement SDK
Samples that demonstrate the body tracking capabilities of the Movement SDK
Samples that demonstrate how the Movement SDK samples can be extended
